snippet: Growth in China's services sector slipped to a six-month low in July as growth in new orders stagnated, data showed, taking some of the shine off an industry that has been a bright spot in the Chinese economy this year....

headline.print_headline: China July Official Services PMI Dips to Six-Month Low
headline.main: China July Official Services PMI Dips to Six-Month Low

lead_paragraph: Growth in China's services sector slipped to a six-month low in July as growth in new orders stagnated, data showed, taking some of the shine off an industry that has been a bright spot in the Chinese economy this year.
